posts.post_content:
Looking to trade the following t206 HOFers(duplicates) for other t206 HOFers.
I will trade 1 for 1 or 4 for 1 plus cash or anything in between. 
I am looking for many(non Piedmont, Sweet Cap, Old Mill preferred).
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]

Cards for trade:
Bender no trees SGC 30-Old Mill
Bender portrait  PSA 4- not PSA most accurate work. not sure what is on his lip,
                               cold sore I guess. EPDG backTRADED
Bresnahan batting SGC 50-nice card EPDG backTRADED
Lajoie with bat   PSA 4-Off center but four sharp corners.TRADED
Still have three left to trade.

I think that is hair gel on his lip.
Sharp stuff Mike!
Bob
